snippet.textDisplay:
I said to myself back when I first found this channel, when there was about 200 uploads - "If this guy ever adds the Luigi's Mansion Theme, he's awesome."

Despite having proven himself awesome again and again, this is the time for me to say it.

Supra, you're awesome.

I said to myself back when I first found this channel, when there was about 200 uploads - "If this guy ever adds the Luigi's Mansion Theme, he's awesome."

Supra, you're awesome.
